course_title: Special Topics in Denominational Studies: Wesley's Ecclesiology
class_notes: (Topic: Wesley's Ecclesiology: Theology of Singleness, Sexuality, and Holiness) (ON CAMPUS) (Meets weekdays 9:00am-3:00pm during May Term) (A research journey through archival artifacts and contemporary resources on John Wesley's commitment to singleness that was lived out in community. Examination of findings through the lens of current conversations and decisions about 'theological differences' impacting human sexual ethics and Methodist ecclesiology.)
schedule_location: MTWThF 9am-3pm in Candler School of Theology 360
sections: Class Nbr: 2048, Section #: 500, Type: LEC, Campus: ATL, Meets: MTWThF 9a-3p, Instructor: N. Cherry, Status: Open
